intro.title: About me
desc: I have built a career focused on backend service operation and maintenance. After acquiring an existing service at a startup, I have performed code refactoring, feature improvements, server migrations, and deployments to enhance service stability. Particularly, I have been responsible for operating APIs directly connected to user interfaces, reproducing errors and analyzing causes to improve them. I aim to be a backend developer who consistently provides stable services like home, product, and content by identifying and fixing even small issues.
__desc__: As a business major, I approach problems from a strategic perspective and have built practical skills across both backend and frontend development through experience at a startup. I'm particularly interested in analyzing user behavior based on data and leveraging insights to improve services. I aim to be a problem-solving developer who is capable not only in development but also in data analysis.

lists.degree: Big Data Analysis & Recommendation System Development

lists.name: Engineer Information Processing
lists.issuer: Human Resources Development Service of Korea

lists.name: AICE: AI Certificate for Everyone - ASSOCIATE

lists.title: AgingLOC
lists.subheading: Development of Backend Service for Health Care Platform
info: AgingLOC is a clinically grounded personalized healthcare platform. It recommends 118 exercise videos and 168 program combinations based on questionnaires, fitness tests, and feedback.
- Took over an existing service, stabilized production, and improved features while cleaning up legacy code.
- Redesigned the admin UI flow for complex exercise-program inputs to improve operational efficiency.
- Built resilience features for real-world drop-off and errors (e.g., draft saves and session persistence).
- Operated user/admin-facing APIs end-to-end: reproduce issues-find root causes-fix-verify.

lists.title: MEDI-EYE
info: MEDI-EYE is a digital healthcare system where doctors prescribe wavelength combinations via a web portal. Patients view prescriptions in a mobile app and control devices via BLE(Bluetooth Low Energy) for eye treatment.
- Supported a live-service server migration by rebuilding the deployment environment and stabilizing operations.
- Deployed and operated the service on Ubuntu-Docker-Nginx.
- Scripted log backup/cleanup to shorten incident response and reduce ops omissions.
- Documented bug reproduction steps, validated fixes, and deployed them.

lists.title: Lumiply
info: A deep learning–based lighting re-lighting project: users upload indoor images, synthesize lighting, and generate results with various colors applied.
Designed an inference-server architecture under limited GPU resources, improving async processing and the overall user waiting experience.

lists.title: TwoMore
info: A mobile fitness tracking app that makes workout routine management easier and more systematic.
You can record sets, repetitions, and weights for each exercise in real-time, and save and manage personal routines and history.

lists.title: Crack Detector
info: Developed a prototype of a mobile app that captures road surfaces with a camera, analyzes each frame in real-time using a YOLO model to detect cracks and sinkholes, and overlays bounding boxes on the smartphone screen during live recording.

lists.title: Konnect
info: A comprehensive assistant for foreigners who live or travel in Korea.
Provides various features such as travel itinerary planning, chatbot, and tourist information.

contact.desc: I'm always looking for new opportunities and collaborations. Please feel free to contact me anytime. I look forward to working together to create great projects.
